title: Initiation
description: "Some secrets you take to your grave"Landon Parker is fresh out of law school and recently engaged to his college sweetheart, Francheska. They both move to New York City when Landon lands a job at Vincent Global, the most prestigious law firm in the City."How far are you willing to go for power?"Landon soon learns his boss Ace Vincent is far from what he expected. He not only wants his loyalty to the company but he also wants to own him. Ace makes Landon an offer he can't refuse and that's when his life starts to spiral out of control. Landon becomes a pawn in Ace's sick perversion and he's forced to live a life of sex, lies, greed and betrayal. "There's just no submerging when you're in too deep." That's what happens when you know about the law-firm's best kept secret.
author: Zack Thorne
